Posts.Content: May 13, 2016 08:26PM Lbower wrote: I have lymphedema and had a diep / tram flap in May 2015 at md andeson cancer center . Also during the procedure they did a lymhnode transplant . A year later I now have lymphedema in my abdoman and its no fun having it my arm breast and abdimon . Not everyone will get itvut if you google abdominal swelling after diep flap theres alot to read and think about . Good luc
Posts.Title: Lymphedema and Diep Sannoliver1 Sannoliver1
